docs.lead_paragraph: The drugs don't work - and neither does the market, when it comes to antibiotics.

headline.main: How to Fix a Broken Market in Antibiotics
headline.print_headline: How to Fix a Broken Market in Antibiotics

docs.lead_paragraph: A growing wing of addiction treatment rejects the Alcoholics Anonymous model of strict abstinence as the sole form of recovery for alcohol and drug users.

headline.main: A Different Path to Fighting Addiction

docs.abstract: Psychologists at Center for Motivation and Change in Midtown Manhattan offer alternative techniques for treating substance abuse and other compulsive behaviors; center is part of a growing wing of addiction treatment that rejects the Alcoholics Anonymous model of strict abstinence as the sole form of recovery for alcohol and drug users.
docs.snippet: A growing wing of addiction treatment rejects the Alcoholics Anonymous model of strict abstinence as the sole form of recovery for alcohol and drug users.

docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown based his recent overhaul of the state corrections system in part on the idea that having those convicted of lower-level crimes supervised by county probation officers instead of state parole agents when they are released would help them stay clean, find jobs and avoid committing new crimes.

headline.main: Homeless Parolees Weigh on California Counties
headline.print_headline: Homeless Parolees Weigh on California Counties

docs.snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown based his recent overhaul of the state corrections system in part on the idea that having those convicted of lower-level crimes supervised by county probation officers instead of state parole agents when they are released would help...

docs.lead_paragraph: The nation's largest pharmacy benefit manager, Express Scripts, is dramatically scaling back its coverage of compounded medications, saying most of the custom-mixed medicines are ineffective or overpriced.

headline.main: Express Scripts Cuts Payments for Customized Drugs
headline.print_headline: Express Scripts Cuts Payments for Customized Drugs

docs.snippet: The nation's largest pharmacy benefit manager, Express Scripts, is dramatically scaling back its coverage of compounded medications, saying most of the custom-mixed medicines are ineffective or overpriced.

docs.lead_paragraph: An Israeli inventor has created a scanner that he says could change the way we shop and take care of ourselves — by reading the chemical makeup of foods, drugs and other items we use.

headline.main: Israeli's Chemical Scanner Could Change Shopping
headline.print_headline: Israeli's Chemical Scanner Could Change Shopping

docs.snippet: An Israeli inventor has created a scanner that he says could change the way we shop and take care of ourselves — by reading the chemical makeup of foods, drugs and other items we use.

docs.lead_paragraph: A C.D.C. report says the decline is one of the first significant drops in fatalities stemming from abuse of oxycodone and other prescription drugs.

headline.main: Prescription Overdose Deaths in Florida Plunge After Tougher Measures, Report Says
headline.print_headline: Prescription Overdose Deaths in Florida Plunge After Tougher Measures, Report Says

docs.abstract: Drug overdose deaths in Florida have fallen since 2010, when the state began stricter regulation of pain medication prescriptions.
docs.snippet: A C.D.C. report says the decline is one of the first significant drops in fatalities stemming from abuse of oxycodone and other prescription drugs.
